songs.title: The Fame (Demo)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Hug me, love me
But don't touch my money when I'm out in the city
The city
We don't wear our flip flops in public because it's lazy and ugly
That shit's ugly

[Pre-Chorus]
All we care about is
Fame, fame, fame, fame
Give me something I wanna be
Famous, famous, famous, famous, famous

[Chorus]
We live for the fame (For the fame, fame)
We live for the fame
Work honey, breathe the fame (Love the fame, fame)
We live for the fame
Kings and queens of pain, love the fame game
They gonna know us, yeah, kn-know our names
We live for the fame (For the fame, fame)
We live for the...fame
(Fame)
(Fame)

[Verse 2]
Give me, give me
Muffin lovin'
I need some attention to heal me
To heal me
I'm an obsessed prom girl
And my crown's tighter than virgins in the '50s
The '50s

[Pre-Chorus]
All we care about is
Fame, fame, fame, fame
Give me something I wanna be
Famous, famous, famous, famous, famous

[Chorus]
We live for the fame (For the fame, fame)
We live for the fame
Work honey, breath the fame (Love the fame, fame)
We live for the fame
Kings and queens of pain, love the fame game
They gonna know us, yeah, kn-know our names
We live for the fame (For the fame, fame)
We live for the fame

[Bridge]
I would be if I could
Hot shit in Hollywood
Everyone let me hear you
We live for the...
I would be if I could
Hot shit in Hollywood
Everyone let me hear you
We live for the...
(Fame)
(Fame)

[Chorus]
We live for the fame (For the fame, fame)
We live for the fame
Work honey, breathe the fame (Love the fame, fame)
We live for the fame
Kings and queens of pain, love the fame game
They gonna know us, yeah, kn-know our names
We live for the fame (For the fame, fame)
We live for the fame

[Outro]
(Fame)
(Fame)
